BNRTools 0.1
  • Reference

Package index

Conversion functions

Key functions to convert model outputs for use in other modelling environments.

conv_downscalr2ibis()
Function to format a prepared GLOBIOM netCDF file for use in ibis.iSDM

Spatial functions

Helper function combine, aggregate or otherwise modify spatial files.

spl_resampleRas()
Resample raster
spl_exportNetCDF()
RExport a gridded raster to a NetCDF format
spl_replaceGriddedNA()
Replace NA values in gridded layers with a fixed value.

Miscellaneous functions

Any other functions that are generally useful for a wide range of applications.

`%notin%`
Inverse of 'in' call
misc_sanitizeNames()
Sanitize variable names
spl_replaceGriddedNA()
Replace NA values in gridded layers with a fixed value.
misc_objectSize()
Shows size of objects in the R environment
